text: Dan Donohue (born August 27, 1966) is an American actor and voice actor from Spokane, Washington who is best known for various video games and screen appearance as the antagonist or supporting character. Some of his most popular video game roles are Teldryn Sero in Skyrim, Shriv Suurgav in Star Wars Battlefront II and Nazi villain Untersturmf√ºhrer Hermann Freisinger in Call of Duty: Vanguard. Before appearing on screen, Donohue played the trumpet and was the Drum Major in High School Band and later became an actor playing "Scar" in Disney's The Lion King on Broadway and the national tour. He was an acting company member at Oregon Shakespeare Festival for 11 seasons since 1994. He is known for For All Mankind (2019), Damnation (2017) and Longmire (2012). ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Spokane, Washington
title: Dan Donohue
